hero.heading: The Language Platform Built for Quality and Fairness
hero.subheading: Connecting motivated learners with vetted, professional tutors backed by better platform support and lower commission fees. Join early to lock in launch discounts on lessons for students and even lower commission rates for tutors guaranteed for the future.

students.title: For Students
students.point1: Learn from vetted professionals who meet strict quality and teaching standards.
students.point2: Choose your learning path: prepare for exams, certificates and more or learn your language with a custom curriculum from the tutor's expertise
students.point3: Match with the right specialist in business, education, or leisure learning.
students.point4: Save more with exclusive early access discounts on lessons.

tutors.title: For Tutors
tutors.point1: Keep more of your earnings with far lower than major platforms that charging between 22%-33% with some charging more.
tutors.point2: Boost your earnings further by locking in an even lower 12% single lesson commission rate for life by signing up early.
tutors.point3: Teach without headaches with responsive support, clear SLAs, and quick issue resolution.
tutors.point4: Rely on fair policies with enforceable, balanced cancellation terms for both sides.

comparison.heading: How Much More You Keep
comparison.subheading: See how ClayLingua stacks up against other platforms when it comes to your earnings from a single lesson.
comparison.note: With ClayLingua, you keep more of every lesson — no hidden payment fees, ever.

how.heading: How Early Access Works
how.step1: Choose your role — Select Student or Tutor so we can tailor your perks.
how.step2: Sign up in seconds — Just your email. No payment, no commitment. We’ll only contact you with relevant updates about launch and your perks.
how.step3: Secure your rewards — Students lock in launch only discounts. Tutors lock in reduced commission rates for life.
how.step4: Get early access — Be first to connect, start learning or teaching, and help shape the platform before public launch.

founder.title: Founder-Led Vision
founder.text1: Hi, I’m Joseph. I’m building ClayLingua to give tutors a fairer, more supportive place to teach with lower fees, clear policies, and real platform support.
founder.text2: For students, that means learning in a safe environment with professional, vetted teachers. Every decision is guided by fairness, quality, and the community we serve.

vetted.title: Vetted Professionals
vetted.text: All tutors are screened for verified qualifications and proven experience before joining the platform.

privacy.title: Privacy, Safety & Transparency
privacy.text: Clear policies, no hidden tricks, and your data always stays yours — plus additional safeguarding features and easy reporting for both students and tutors.
